Name: Gear Puzzle: the inheritance of grandpa
About the game: Gear Puzzle: The Inheritance of Grandpa is a Click & Point Puzzle game. You are the teenager who want to celebrate the birthday of your sister. But there's something wrong happening around your family. Your father is missing, Your whole family got no money, Your family house is going to be taken by the bad guysâ€¦ If you want to save your family, the only thing you can to is discovering the hidden truth.. - 11 handcraft footage with gorgeous detail inspired by steampunk movie - Find the hidden truth by solving 30 puzzles.
